description: The multiplayer works on the steam deck, i used chatgbt to give me the right settings. my girl and i play smashbros brawl online. Host with Traversal Server, set the buffer to 9, make sure you assign controller ports. works full speed.

Choosing the dev branch over the release branch has made it impossible to play with my friends unless I download the release version and run it through WINE. really wasn't a smart choice since all it did was add achievement support and those will come to the stable branch in a couple months. Please revert back to the release branch so netplay is actually usable.
summary: Worked great until they switched to Dev branch

description: Whoever maintains this flathub listing made the decision to revert it back to version 2407 and now RetroAchievements does not work, since the minimum required version for RetroAchievements is 2407-68, which is a newer version than 2407. Please switch this flathub listing back to the latest dev version, or at least switch it back to 2407-68. Better yet, make a new flathub listing that uses the latest dev version, and keep this one on the latest stable build.
summary: Reverted back to version 2407 and now retroachievements doesn't work

As Dolphin almost never has numbered "stable" releases (the last one was released over five years ago!), most distros' repositories have quite outdated versions of Dolphin.

In contrast, this unofficial Flatpak version of Dolphin matches the latest Beta release. Everything works as you'd expect; the maintainers of this Flatpak recently fixed a long-standing bug, allowing real Wiimotes to be used.

The emulator itself is one of the most feature-packed & mature emulators I've ever used. Dolphin isn't just the best Gamecube/Wii emulator, it's one of the best emulators period.
summary: The best way to use Dolphin on Linux

El emulador es casi perfecto, tiene todas las opciones para configurar los controles y la interfaz es idéntica a Dolphin de la versión de Windows. Incluso pude importar los perfiles de la configuración de los controles y haciendo algunas correcciones en la configuración funciona perfecto.

Sin embargo, tengo dos inconvenientes que no tenía con la versión de Windows, 1. Puedo conectar el Wiimote al computador pero Dolphin no lo reconoce y 2. Cuando conecto el mando de Xbox 360 funciona pero no es posible activar la opción para que el mando vibre.
summary: No puedo conectar un Wiimote a Dolphin
